text: The following lists events that happened in 1934 in Iceland. ==Incumbents== *Monarch - Kristján X *Prime Minister - Ásgeir Ásgeirsson, Hermann Jónasson ==Events== ==Births== *27 February - Reynir Karlsson, footballer *22 April - Peter Ronson, athlete (d. 2007) *5 June - Vilhjálmur Einarsson, athlete, Iceland's first ever Olympic medalist (d. 2019) *9 June - Valbjörn Þorláksson, track and field athlete (d. 2009). *12 July - Kristinn Gunnlaugsson, footballer *14 August - Guðrún Katrín Þorbergsdóttir, First Lady of Iceland (d. 1998) *23 August - Helgi Björgvinsson, footballer *18 September - Sveinn Einarsson, theatre director ===Full date missing=== *Arnór Hannibalsson, philosopher and historian (d. 2012) *Bjarni Jónsson, painter (d. 2008) ==Deaths== Finnur Jónsson *30 March - Finnur Jónsson, philologist (b. 1858) ==References== Category:1930s in Iceland Iceland Iceland Category:Years of the 20th century in Iceland
title: 1934 in Iceland
